FuncDef: This command creates or edits an LI reserved block. An LI reserved block allows an operator to define where entries from an LI filter should be inserted into a normal filter. The block reserves a configurable number of entries in the normal filter that can only be used for entries inserted from associated LI filters. The LI filter entries that get inserted into the reserved block in each normal filter are not visible to non-LI operators. The block also defines to which normal filters the reservation is applied.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the MAC filter. Block names cannot start with an underscore character (for example, "_my-filter") and cannot use the name "default".
